# SticsRFiles

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of SticsRFiles is to perform manipulations of the Stics model files. 

## Installation

The development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) can be installed with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("SticsRPacks/SticsRFiles")
```
Or using the lightweight [remotes](https://github.com/r-lib/remotes#readme) package: 

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("SticsRPacks/SticsRFiles")
```
